FloorPlan.Name: 1 Bedroom
FloorPlan.Description: Extra-large corner apartment with beautiful views of Park Avenue and the Chrysler building. This home features a renovated kitchen and bathroom.

FloorPlan.Name: 2 Bedroom
FloorPlan.Description: Extra-large 2 bedroom 2 baths with beautiful views of Park Avenue and a back fall garden. The home features a floor through lay-out with renovated kitchen with top shelf appliances and granite countertops and 2 marble bathrooms.
